Pre-Game Insights: Both India and Afghanistan are hurting from their early exit in the tournament
India needs a win to avoid finishing last in the Super 4s
Afghanistan will have to turn up fresh less than 18 hours after their potboiler against Pakistan in Sharjah
It's a question of trying to go a step further for Afghanistan to close out games
Miscellaneous Highlights: This game will decide who finishes last in the Super 4s
International cricket can be demanding, but their scheduling, in these oppressive conditions, has been anything but kind
Others: India will have to turn up and fight for every run, every wicket
Afghanistan have twice lost games they have been in control of
Bhuvneshwar Kumar has had two poor outings, especially in the death overs
Mujeeb Ur Rahman has returned as one of Afghanistan's premier spinners
Deepak Chahar was officially drafted into the squad on the eve of the game
India could also bring in Dinesh Karthik and Axar Patel for Rishabh Pant Deepak Hooda
